医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究强调黑人患者的亨廷顿病诊断延迟加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心领导的新研究显示，美国和加拿大的亨廷顿舞蹈症黑人患者在症状首次出现后平均比白人患者晚一年得到诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/UCLA-research-highlights-delayed-Huntingtons-disease-diagnosis-for-Black-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/UCLA-research-highlights-delayed-Huntingtons-disease-diagnosis-for-Black-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b1d41e0-e20a-4ab5-8974-cb5f6e1d9d9f Tue, 09 Jul 2024 23:56:00 -0400 UCLA research highlights delayed Huntington's disease diagnosis for Black patients
肠道微生物组健康对实体器官移植后的生存至关重要《肠道》杂志在线发表的研究发现，“不健康”的肠道微生物组模式与实体器官移植后死亡风险升高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Gut-microbiome-health-crucial-to-survival-after-solid-organ-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Gut-microbiome-health-crucial-to-survival-after-solid-organ-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=457d4df2-fc94-494a-85ca-0b97da59575a Tue, 09 Jul 2024 23:50:23 -0400 Gut microbiome health crucial to survival after solid organ transplants
骨关节炎与严重长期疾病的加速进展有关开放获取期刊《RMD》上发表的一项为期 20 年的研究发现，骨关节炎——一种骨骼末端的保护性软骨断裂的疾病——可能会使快速进展为严重长期疾病（多发病）的风险增加一倍以上打开。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Osteoarthritis-linked-to-accelerated-progression-of-severe-long-term-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Osteoarthritis-linked-to-accelerated-progression-of-severe-long-term-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22ff62b0-50fe-4427-9d42-ce911115ce4c Tue, 09 Jul 2024 23:45:14 -0400 Osteoarthritis linked to accelerated progression of severe long-term conditions
研究确定了对预防羟考酮复发至关重要的大脑区域即使在康复多年后，曾经与酒精或阿片类药物成瘾作斗争的人也可能会复发，而且这种复发更有可能发生在压力特别大的时期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Study-pinpoints-brain-area-ritic-to-oxycodone-relapse-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Study-pinpoints-brain-area-ritic-to-oxycodone-relapse-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83214aaa-f683-4081-9b0f-110a3f24910e Tue, 09 Jul 2024 23:35:22 -0400 Study pinpoints brain area critical to oxycodone relapse prevention
内分泌疾病家族史增加流产风险一项新研究发现，近亲患有内分泌疾病（包括 2 型糖尿病、甲状腺疾病和多囊卵巢综合征 (PCOS)）的女性流产的风险较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Pregnancy-loss-risk-heightened-by-family-history-of-endocrine-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Pregnancy-loss-risk-heightened-by-family-history-of-endocrine-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b209b53-9811-452a-8e7f-0f032c7813fc Tue, 09 Jul 2024 22:52:36 -0400 Pregnancy loss risk heightened by family history of endocrine diseases
四年糖尿病延迟可减少糖尿病前期患者的死亡和并发症被诊断为糖尿病前期的个体如果通过饮食和锻炼将糖尿病的发病延迟四年，就可以降低死亡和糖尿病相关健康并发症的长期风险。中日友好医院的李光伟及其同事在 7 月 9 日发表在开放获取期刊 PLOS Medicine 上的一项新研究中报告了这些发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Four-year-diabetes-delay-reduces-death-and-complications-in-prediabetic-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Four-year-diabetes-delay-reduces-death-and-complications-in-prediabetic-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=783a3925-631e-42b0-bb99-3f77a99e3d19 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 22:46:50 -0400 Four-year diabetes delay reduces death and complications in prediabetic patients
研究人员获得 200 万美元资助，以推进与年龄相关的认知障碍的研究俄克拉荷马大学的两名研究人员获得了 Hevolution 基金会超过 200 万美元的资助，以进一步研究与年龄相关的认知障碍，重点是改善“健康寿命”，即一个人保持健康的年数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Researchers-receive-242-million-in-grants-to-advance-studies-on-age-lated-cognitive-impairment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Researchers-receive-242-million-in-grants-to-advance-studies-on-age-lated-cognitive-impairment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55b657de-11be-49b5-95c9-27aa66490b53 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 22:40:14 -0400 Researchers receive $2 million in grants to advance studies on age-related cognitive impairment
梅奥诊所为癌症患者进行全喉移植创造病史梅奥诊所宣布在器官移植方面取得突破性成就，为成千上万因喉功能减弱或丧失而失去自主说话、吞咽和呼吸能力的人带来希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Mayo-Clinic-makes-medical-history-with-total-larynx-transplant-for-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Mayo-Clinic-makes-medical-history-with-total-larynx-transplant-for-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=510a7ad4-b9e7-4aaf-9835-2499bb318df9 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 22:32:09 -0400 Mayo Clinic makes medical history with total larynx transplant for cancer patient
调查显示许多女性不知道微创子宫肌瘤治疗在个人被诊断患有子宫肌瘤的女性中，超过一半 (53%) 接受了子宫切除术，而只有不到五分之一 (20%) 的女性接受了其他侵入性较小的选择，例如非处方非甾体抗炎药 (NSAID)。根据代表介入放射学会的哈里斯民意调查的最新调查数据，子宫肌瘤栓塞术（19%）、子宫肌瘤栓塞术（17%）、口服避孕药（17%）和子宫内膜去除术（17%）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Survey-reveals-many-women-unaware-of-minimally-侵袭-uterine-纤维瘤-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Survey-reveals-many-women-unaware-of-minimally-guarantee-uterine-纤维瘤-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=783c0c5f-85cb-49a1-9e6c-e9271a0af09c Tue, 09 Jul 2024 21:47:29 -0400 Survey reveals many women unaware of minimally invasive uterine fibroid treatments
干细胞样细胞被发现可促进侵袭性儿童脑肿瘤的生长贝勒医学院、德克萨斯儿童医院、多伦多病童医院和合作机构的一组研究人员发现并定位了一群干细胞样细胞，这些干细胞在发育中的细胞中引发并维持第 3 类髓母细胞瘤 (Gr3-MB)。脑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Stem-like-cells-found-to-drive-growth-of-aggressive-pediatric-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Stem-like-cells-found-to-drive-growth-of-aggressive-pediatric-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=919fa428-e5cb-4998-b644-e005189927c6 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 21:39:48 -0400 Stem-like cells found to drive growth of aggressive pediatric brain tumors
